Authorization: The order was canceled on ogone side.

To hash all parameters, select the following options in the "Global security parameters" fieldset:
  • Each parameter followed by the pass phrase.
  • "Hash algorithm" same as "Hashing Algorithm" below
  • UTF-8
Autorisatie:
Om alle parameters te hashen, selecteer de volgende opties in de "Global security parameters" fieldset:
  • Elke parameter gevolgd door de volgende zin..
  • "Hash algoritme" zoals "Hashing Algoritme" hieronder
  • UTF-8
